metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17577 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Dolibarr 10.0.2. It has XSS via the "outgoing email setup" feature in the admin/mails.php?action=edit URI via the "Email used for error returns emails (fields 'Errors-To' in emails sent)" field.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
